00023 // include files for QT
00024 #include <qmap.h>

00030 class ProgramInformation{
00031 public:
00033  inline ProgramInformation(){};
00035  inline ~ProgramInformation(){};
00036 
00040   inline void setProgramName(QString name){this->name = name;};
00041     
00045   inline void setHelp(QString help){this->help = help;};
00046  
00051  inline void setParameterInformation(QMap<int, QValueList<QString> >& parameters){
00052   this->parameters = parameters;
00053  };
00054  
00056  inline QString getProgramName() const{return name;};
00057 
00059  inline QString getHelp() const{return help;};
00060  
00064  QMap<int, QValueList<QString> > getParameterInformation(){return parameters;};
00065  
00066  private:
00067   QString name;
00068   QMap<int, QValueList<QString> > parameters;
